product.title: Cute Nano One Piece Pirate Ships Building Sets
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Bring your favourite Anime to life!

    Becoming a pirate involves mighty crews, tales of adventure, magical fruits, samurais, and giant robots, are you up for the thrill? Before anyone can just go sailing along the vast oceans, they need a means of traveling on its harsh waters. 

    🚢  Measurements: about 6x7in / 15x19cm of each set
    🚢  Not compatible with leading blocks of standard size (16mm) 
    🚢  This is Nano blocks (8mm)
    🚢  Each set has over 1600 nano pieces and varies of each set
    ♻   Excludes the original box to protect the environment, see below for details

     

    Take this opportunity to build your own pirate ship and take on your own sea monsters and rival pirates! Choose between four different ships to survive and fight on.


    📦 Please note: All building sets do not come with the original box to protect the environment but they do come in separate bags. For further details please see below.* Save our planet from unnecessary waste.

    The perfect gift for those who love ANIME!

    These One Piece Pirate Ships are a great gift for any ANIME fans! These huge versions of the three most famous pirate ships in the anime series will definitely be a memorable gift. Place these ships together to create an impressive city!

    Nano Blocks: Smaller than the micro and traditional building block.



    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet, and reduce postage cost on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow along. 

    Features

    🚢 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    🚢 Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    🚢 Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    🚢 High-quality durable non-toxic green material

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contain small parts; not suitable for children under 8 years old unless there is adult supervision.


  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks is a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • International Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
